publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2450 Hugh Henry: World AIDS Day: 1 December 2001â€”That the Parliament notes World AIDS Day on 1 December 2001 and the "Out of sight, out of mind" campaign; further notes that recent figures published show that 91 people have been diagnosed as HIV positive in the first six months of this year compared with 154 in total for the previous year and that, if this trend continues for the rest of the year, it would represent an 18% increase over last year; further notes that, if the number of people aged 15 to 24 being diagnosed as HIV positive continues at the current rate, there will be a 47% increase by the end of the year, and therefore urges the Scottish Executive to undertake a high profile national campaign on HIV and AIDS awareness.
S1M-2450 World AIDS Day: 1 December 2001 (lodged on 14 November 2001) Trish Godman*, Mike Watson*, Janis Hughes*

S1M-2450 Hugh Henry: World AIDS Day: 1 December 2001-That the Parliament notes World AIDS Day on 1 December 2001 and the "Out of sight, out of mind" campaign; further notes that recent figures published show that 91 people have been diagnosed as HIV positive in the first six months of this year compared with 154 in total for the previous year and that, if this trend continues for the rest of the year, it would represent an 18% increase over last year; further notes that, if the number of people aged 15 to 24 being diagnosed as HIV positive continues at the current rate, there will be a 47% increase by the end of the year, and therefore urges the Scottish Executive to undertake a high profile national campaign on HIV and AIDS awareness. Supported by: Trish Godman, Mike Watson, Janis Hughes
S1M-2450 World AIDS Day: 1 December 2001 (lodged on 14 November 2001) Robin Harper*
S1M-2450 World AIDS Day: 1 December 2001 (lodged on 14 November 2001) Irene Oldfather*, Nora Radcliffe*, Christine Grahame*

S1M-2450 World AIDS Day: 1 December 2001 (lodged on 14 November 2001) Fiona Hyslop*, Cathy Jamieson*, Iain Smith*, Karen Whitefield*, Mr Michael McMahon*, Tavish Scott*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Margaret Jamieson*, Michael Matheson*, Brian Fitzpatrick*, Rhoda Grant*, Fiona McLeod*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Ms Sandra White*, Margaret Smith*, Bill Butler*
S1M-2450 World AIDS Day: 1 December 2001 (lodged on 14 November 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Elaine Thomson*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Richard Lochhead*, Mr John Home Robertson*
S1M-2450 World AIDS Day: 1 December 2001 (lodged on 14 November 2001) Dorothy-Grace Elder*

S1M-2450 World AIDS Day: 1 December 2001 (lodged on 14 November 2001) Dennis Canavan*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*
S1M-2450 World AIDS Day: 1 December 2001 (lodged on 14 November 2001) Ms Margo MacDonald*
